root.name: DayZ
root.description: OverviewOn August 7, 2012 it was announced that the popular zombie survival mod for ArmA II will receive a standalone release developed by Bohemia Interactive with original mod creator Dean “Rocket” Hall as the project lead. The project will follow in the footsteps of Minecraft's highly effective model of "fast iterations with the community alpha available for a heavily discounted price.”Development of the original mod will continue in parallel along with the standalone game.
